name_abbreviation: Stambaugh's Air Service, Inc. v. Larson

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson, zappala and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: STAMBAUGH’S AIR SERVICE, INC., Appellant, v. Thomas D. LARSON, Secretary, Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Transportation.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Order affirmed.
LARSEN, J., dissents.

casebody.head_matter:
524 A.2d 491
STAMBAUGH’S AIR SERVICE, INC., Appellant, v. Thomas D. LARSON, Secretary, Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Transportation.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 9, 1987.
Decided April 20, 1987.
Michael Q. Davis, Harrisburg, for appellant.
William J. Cressler, Harrisburg, Spencer A. Manthrope, Philadelphia, Kenneth Kendall, Springfield, Andrew H. Cline, Harrisburg, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson, zappala and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
